Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Nighttime \Night"time`\, n. The time from dusk to dawn; -- opposed to {daytime}. [1913 Webster]

nighttime adj : happening during or appropriate to the night; "nighttime attire"; "the cat's nighttime prowls" [ant: {daytime}] n : the time after sunset and before sunrise while it is dark outside [syn: {night}, {dark}] [ant: {day}]
